channel.title: Some Noob Info Needed
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I pretty much need a guide which knows everything about SCAR =D I need pretty much alot of Info about it, where to get it, what I need, a good Scar site, how to use it etc. If someone could help me that would be great. And if you want, add me to your msn (If you have it).
eatkenny@hotmail.com,
ANY help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance :cool:

item.title: Some Noob Info Needed
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Bumping is not allowed.

In your DeclarePlayers procedure set HowManyPlayers too 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Noob Info Needed
item.dc:creator: @Stephan1 .Stephan
item.description:
@Stephan1 wrote:

I’ll post it tomorrow morning. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 04:00:54 AM[/size][hr]

program PowerCutter;

procedure DropEm; forward;
procedure CutItDown; forward;
procedure FFight; forward;
procedure Report; forward;
procedure LogNewPlayer; forward;

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\skill\WoodCutting.scar}

//////////////////////////////////////////////////
/// SetUp Lines 30,34, 38-50 & 70-84 ///
//////////////////////////////////////////////////

type
AUser = record
TreeToCut : String;
Compass : String;
TreeC1 : Integer;
TreeC2 : Integer;
LogsToCut : Integer;
LogsChopped : Integer;
EXP : Integer;
end;

var
Player : array of AUser;

const
StartPlayer = 1; //Player To Start With

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 1; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer := StartPlayer; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

Players[0].Name := ‘R A N D’; //Your Username
Players[0].Pass := ‘bobby’; //Your Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘RAND’; //3 or 4 letters from your Username
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; //DONT TOUCH
Players[0].Skill := ‘WoodCutting’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True; //Will You Be Using This Player?

Players[1].Name := ‘A Level A 3’; //Your Username
Players[1].Pass := ‘’; //Your Password
Players[1].Nick := ‘evel’; //3 or 4 letters from your Username
Players[1].Loc := ‘’; //DONT TOUCH
Players[1].Skill := ‘WoodCutting’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[1].Active := False; //Will You Be Using This Player?

writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
end;

////////////////////////
/// EXP GUIDE ///
///Tree = 25 ///
///Oak = 37 ///
///Willow = 62 ///
///Teak = 100 ///
///Mahogany = 125 ///
///Yew = 175 ///
///Magic = 250 ///
////////////////////////

Procedure DeclarePlayerTree;
begin
SetArrayLength(Player, HowManyPlayers);

Player[0].Compass := ‘N’; //Way to face when you log in, incase there are other trees which interfere
Player[0].TreeToCut := ‘Tree’; //The Name of the Tree You Are Cutting
Player[0].TreeC1 := 3035208; //The Colour of the tree your are cutting
Player[0].TreeC2 := 3698784; //Another Colour of the tree your are cutting
Player[0].LogsToCut := 100; //How many logs For This User to cut
Player[0].EXP := 2500; //See Guide Above For EXP
Player[0].LogsChopped := 0 //DONT TOUCH

Player[1].Compass := ‘E’; //Way to face when you log in, incase there are other trees which interfere
Player[1].TreeToCut := ‘Tree’; //The Name of the Tree You Are Cutting
Player[1].TreeC1 := 3043424; //The Colour of the tree your are cutting
Player[1].TreeC2 := 2109480; //Another Colour of the tree your are cutting
Player[1].LogsToCut := 200; //How many logs For This User to cut
Player[1].EXP := 25; //See Guide Above For EXP
Player[1].LogsChopped := 0 //DONT TOUCH

end;

function FindEnt1(TreeColor: Integer): Boolean;
begin
if(Option2(‘Chop’))then
begin
if(FindColorTolerance(x, y, 383705, 9, 9, 233, 24, 20))or
(FindColorTolerance(x, y, 65535, 9, 9, 233, 24, 20))then
begin
WriteLn(‘Found possible ent! Waiting for it to go away’);
Wait(30000 + random(5000));
Result := True;
EntsAvoided := EntsAvoided + 1;
end;
end;
end;

procedure LogIn;
begin
if (FindColor(x, y, 8353396, 262, 208, 262, 208)) then
begin
LogInPlayer;
MakeComPass(Player[CurrentPlayer].Compass);
end;
end;

procedure LogNewPlayer;
Var
D: integer;
begin
LogOut;
If ((CurrentPlayer+1) > (HowManyPlayers-1)) then
begin
Writeln(‘All users have cut…Terminating Script…’);
TerminateScript;
end else
begin
For D := (CurrentPlayer+1) to (HowManyPlayers-1) Do
begin
If (Players[D].Active = True) then
begin
If (Players[D].Loc = ‘’) then
begin
Players[CurrentPlayer].Active := False;
CurrentPlayer:= D;
Writeln(‘New Player:’);
LogIn;
FindAxeHeadColor;
MakeComPass(Player[CurrentPlayer].Compass);
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
Exit;
end;
end;
end;
end;
end;

Function ChopTree(Colour1, Colour2: integer; TreeToCut: String): Boolean;
var
Attempts: Integer;
Box: TBox;
begin
MarkTime(Attempts);
Result:= False;
Box:= cBox2(MSX1-3, MSY1-3, MSX1+1, MSY1+1);
Repeat
if FindColorSkipBox(x, y, Colour1, MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2, Box) then
begin
if FindColor(x, y, Colour2, x - 25, y - 25, x + 25, y + 25) then
begin
end;
MMouse(x, y, 5, 5);
GetMousePos(x, y);
wait(400);
FindEnt1(Player[CurrentPlayer].TreeC1);
FindEnt1(Player[CurrentPlayer].TreeC2);
if IsUpTextMulti('Chop down ’ + TreeToCut, TreeToCut, 'down ’ + TreeToCut) then
begin
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
Result:= True;
wait(1000);
Exit;
end else
begin
Box:= cBox2(MSX1-3, MSY1-3, MSX2+3, y+25);
LogIn;
Case Random(6) of
0: begin
MakeComPass(‘N’);
Box:= cBox2(MSX1-3, MSY1-3, MSX1+1, MSY1+1);
end;
1: begin
MakeComPass(‘E’);
Box:= cBox2(MSX1-3, MSY1-3, MSX1+1, MSY1+1);
end;
2: Box:= cBox2(MSX1-3, MSY1-3, MSX1+1, MSY1+1);
3: begin
MakeComPass(‘W’);
Box:= cBox2(MSX1-3, MSY1-3, MSX1+1, MSY1+1);
end;
4: Box:= cBox2(MSX1-3, MSY1-3, MSX1+1, MSY1+1);
5: begin
MakeComPass(‘S’);
Box:= cBox2(MSX1-3, MSY1-3, MSX1+1, MSY1+1);
end;
end;
wait(1000);
end;
end;
Until((TimeFromMark(Attempts)>300000));
If Not (Result) then
begin
Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc:= ‘Unable To Find Tree’;
LogNewPlayer;
end;
end;

Function NoAxe: Boolean;
var
c: Integer;
begin
c := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(‘You do not have an axe’, SmallChars);
If (FindBitmapMaskTolerance(c, x, y, 17, 410, 495, 452, 10, 85)) then
begin
Result:= True;
end else
begin
Result:= False;
end;
end;

procedure FFight;
begin
If Not(FindNewBox) then
begin
If (Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc = ‘New Box’) then
begin
Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc := ‘’;
end;
end;
If Not (NoAxe) then
begin
If (Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc = ‘No Usable Axe’) then Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc := ‘’;
end;
If (NoAxe) then
begin
Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc := ‘No Usable Axe’;
FindHead;
TypeSend(‘Argh…’+chr(13));
ChopTree(Player[CurrentPlayer].TreeC1, Player[CurrentPlayer].TreeC2, Player[CurrentPlayer].TreeToCut);
If (NoAxe) then LogNewPlayer;
end;
If (InBlack) then
begin
Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc := ‘In Black’;
LogNewPlayer;
end;
if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln(‘Found Fight’);
RunTo(‘W’, True);
end;
if (WeAreDead) then
begin
Writeln(‘You Have Died…Changing Player’);
Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc:= ‘Died’;
LogNewPlayer;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
SolveBox;
wait(1000);
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘Unable To Solve Box…’);
Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc := ‘New Box’;
Report;
LogNewPlayer;
end;
end;
end;

procedure CutItDown;
var
Waited4: integer;
begin
while (not (InvFull)) do
begin
Repeat
LogIn;
Status(‘Searching For Tree’);
Until(ChopTree(Player[CurrentPlayer].TreeC1, Player[CurrentPlayer].TreeC2, Player[CurrentPlayer].TreeToCut));
Status(‘Cutting Tree’);
MarkTime(Waited4);
wait(350);
repeat
FindEnt1(Player[CurrentPlayer].TreeC1);
FindEnt1(Player[CurrentPlayer].TreeC2);
FindPlant;
Report;
FFight;
FindNormalRandoms;
LogIn;
wait(300 + 100);
until ((not IsUpText('Chop down ’ + Player[CurrentPlayer].TreeToCut)) or (TimeFromMark(Waited4)>30000) or (InvFull));
end;
DropEm;
wait(1000);
end;

function donechop: boolean;
begin
if ((Player[CurrentPlayer].LogsChopped >= Player[CurrentPlayer].LogsToCut)) then
begin
Result:= True;
end Else
begin
Result:= False;
end;
end;

procedure DropEm;
var
rx, ry, m, n: Integer;
begin
MMouse(584, 226, 5, 5);
Status(‘Dropping Logs’);
Gametab(4);
for M := 1 to 7 do
begin
for n := 1 to 4 do
begin
rx := 544 + (n * 42);
ry := 192 + (m * 36);
mmouse(rx, ry, 5, 5);
getmousepos(x, y);
wait(100 + random(100));
if (Not (IsUpText(‘Wield’))) then
begin
mouse(x, y, 0, 0, false);
wait(10 + random(50));
if (ChooseOption(x, y, ‘Drop’)) then
begin
if (InBlack) then
begin
Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc:= ‘In Black’;
LogNewPlayer;
Exit;
end;
If (donechop) then
begin
LogNewPlayer;
Exit;
end;
Report;
FFight;
FindNormalRandoms;
Player[CurrentPlayer].LogsChopped := Player[CurrentPlayer].LogsChopped + 1;
end;
end;
end;
end;
end;

procedure Report;
Var
d: integer;
begin
if (not (Player[CurrentPlayer].LogsChopped >= Player[CurrentPlayer].LogsToCut)) then
begin
Writeln(’<===========================================>’);
Writeln(’ You Are Using Nashi’‘s PowerCutter’)
Writeln(’ Worked For ’ + TimeRunning);
For d := 0 to (HowManyPlayers-1) do
begin
if (Player[d].LogsChopped <> 0) then
begin
Writeln(’---------------------------------------------’);
Writeln(’ ’ + Players[d].Name + ’ Has…’);
Writeln(’ Cut & Dropped ’ + IntToStr(Player[d].LogsChopped) + ’ Logs!’);
Writeln(’ Gained ’ + IntToStr(Player[d].LogsChopped * Player[d].EXP) + ’ XP!’);
end;
if (Players[d].Loc <> ‘’) then
begin
Writeln(’---------------------------------------------’);
Writeln(’ ’ + Players[d].Name + ‘’‘s Loc Is: ’ + Players[d].Loc);
end;
end;
Writeln(’<===========================================>’);
SRLRandomsReport;
end else
begin
Writeln(Players[CurrentPlayer].Name + ’ Has Finished Cutting…Changing Player’);
LogNewPlayer;
Exit;
end;
end;

begin
SetUpSRL;
BenMouse := True;
MouseSpeed := 1;
ClearDebug;
Writeln(‘Script Will Start In 3…’);
Wait(1000);
Writeln(‘Script Will Start In 2…’);
Wait(1000);
Writeln(‘Script Will Start In 1…’);
Wait(1000);
Writeln(‘Thank You For Using Nashi’‘s PowerChopper’);
Writeln(‘Hope You Dont Get Killed!’);
DeclarePlayers;
DeclarePlayerTree;
DisguiseScar(‘No page to display - Microsoft Internet Explorer’);
LogIn;
FindAxeHeadColor;
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
repeat
CutItDown;
until (false);
end.

There is what I type, the Username & Password are fake, so don’t even try.
Is this correct or am I doing something terribly stupid?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 02:45:59 PM[/size][hr]Oh and this is the problem again…

[Runtime Error] : Out Of Range in line 46 in script C:\Documents and Settings\Turnbull\Desktop\PCutter.scar
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 02:48:33 PM[/size][hr]Bump.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 11:34:07 PM[/size][hr]Bump

Read full topic

item.title: Some Noob Info Needed
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

You set your DeclarePlayers; procedure wrong. Copy and paste what you put in the procedure DeclarePlayers, just edit out the passwords.

Read full topic
